title: Fundamentals Of
author: Fundamentals Of
content: Just hours ago, Solana is being attacked. As of this posting, the attack hasn't ended yet. So far, the stolen amount has already exceeded $6 million. It is advised for users to start "unlinking browser-based Solana wallets from all internet sites, and moving funds to a new clean wallet." And this is urgent. If you have cold wallets, it is better to transfer your coins and tokens there for the time being. It is found out that hot wallets such as Phantom, Slope, and Trust Wallet are already being drained of funds because of this current attack.1. https://www.business2community.com/crypto-news/solana-hack-5-million-exploit-of-phantom-wallets-slope-wallets-025311882. https://www.coindesk.com/markets/2022/08/03/phantom-wallet-exploit-drains-millions-in-sol-tokens/

comments.author: X-ray
comments.body: It's sad to see that so many attack happened with crypto. Decentralized bridged and wallets are not safe anymore. I saw a few days ago the hack happened with some bridged and this time it's happening with phantom wallet. Just wanna know how amateur those developers are. I think that it would better if any hacked cases that happened with the platforms and then dev must be sued to the court. This to make sure if they are working in what they can afford to make sure the security was safe.

Lucky the few I bought are still in the exchange.

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: It has been many times that there is a problem with the solana network so security or breaching is likely to be expected. Aside from it many are hating solana for continously breaking down. Team should do is fix this fully and hire a lot of security developer or else other investors and retailers would jump ship. No doubt it will happened if the problem hasnt sold today or in the coming days.Even normal users has been affected, it seems the hackers are pretty well ready for this incident.

comments.author: hyudien
comments.body: I also got several notifications from major exchanges to withdraw assets from Solana when the attack occurred. This is quite worrying, Solana gets attacks like this every year and the worst thing is this is happening. They often announce blackouts at the center of the network due to several problems but as they continue to face problems like this, investors and traders start to lose confidence. It is not advisable to keep finances in Solana long term, I am afraid this will not be resolved in a short time.

comments.author: JoyMarsha
comments.body: Will this be the end of another top altcoin? We are yet to forget what terra luna has done to investors, losing their money. Now, Solana is hit by hackers siphoning people's money. Who knows the next top altcoin that will be rug pulled? We are all in a pathetic situation.The crypto space is no longer safe as we think it is.

comments.author: zasad@
comments.body: The saddest thing in this situation is that the reason why money disappears from users' wallets is still not clear. If this is a problem with smart contracts, then this problem is solved by transferring funds to another wallet, but what if the problem is more serious?

comments.author: cheezcarls
comments.body: Yes I am afraid that it’s not safe for us anymore to keep our hard earned money there. As much as possible, it’s better to disconnect and remove all permissions from all sites now and store them in a hardware wallet that supports Solana and SOL-based tokens. That’s where I have learned it myself when I was hacked around $12k from 3 of my Metamask and Trust Wallets combined. The hackers have improved their skills, so we should also improve and adjust to make our assets safe.
